I have been loads of times, but I am also going on the weekend again 
27-28th not decided, maybe Sunday,
It is mostly the Yabusame that I want to see. But The Oriental 
gallery is excellent. I have made a flag (a mini Sashimono) of the 
Soma family-due to horse riding connections-Yabusame-horse archery. I 
will probably look damn silly, but I don't care, because, We should 
support events like this as enthusiastically as possible NE? Ok then, 
If you see someone with a flag of Soma family, One large circle eight 
small ones around it. Feel free to stop and chat. Or run away in 
Terror. 

all the best Mark
